name: Blood Mortgage
description:
Join Kalthuzar the Fortuitous, the former Tri-County champion, as he plays against the new generation of Die Fighters.  The prize? Getting his former title, and a shot at winning the Hut of Baba Yaga as his new house. Convenient timing, considering he just got evicted! 

Die Fighting, if you don't know, is the game of choice for the more mystical members of society. Each face of a 6-sided die can be enchanted with various Glyphs that modify the Value of the Face. Kalthuzar, as an experienced wizard, has many Glyphs to choose from. Build your Die and try your luck against demons, imps, and witches!

Tips and Controls:

  • Movement with WASD or arrow keys.
  • Press C for various tool tips and notes about the world.
  • Press Esc to open your Die Enchanting Menu.
    • To Enchant, first select a face (type 1-6), then choose a Glyph (type a-z).
    • To learn more about a Glyph, hold Shift then type the letter corresponding to the Glyph of interest.
  • Interact with other characters by walking close to them.
  • Some characters will just want to talk, walk away and return to hear more dialogue. Other characters will want to fight.
  • There is no penalty for losing, so feel free to experiment and develop your own strategy!
